Text:
And so, both the corrupt magistrate and the bandits
were taken care of.

My father took the evidence he 'found' and reported
it to the capital. No punishment, everyone's at peace
and lived happily ever after... Or so I'd like to say.
Hah!

Her sideways blow flings the sword right out of
my hand.
You win...

In reality, I left an opening so that she could
disarm me, but Claire's training is intense.

You give up too easily! If you lose your sword,
use your fists!

You want me to fight a sword with my bare hands?!
I'm just gonna lose those too...

Then use your legs! If your legs get cut off,
bite the enemy!

She's being absolutely spartan. Who trains an
aristocrat's son like this?!
Hey... What's with getting so strict all of a sudden?

Hey, backtalk will only get you more of the same!
Only next time I'm going to stop pulling myâ€”
...Agh! *cough, cough*

Right as Claire tries to build up her magic, she is
overcome by a coughing fit.
(Looks like she really isn't feeling well.)

You can be tough on me all you want, but you're tough
on yourself too. If you keep going like that, you'll break.

Ha, I hope so! If I do, then it just means that's the
end for me in this life!

(She really thinks this is the end, and she can't do
anything about it. I bet she resents that.)

Gah... If I was in top form, I could've put an end to
it right here!

Why won't my magic obey my wishes...? This has never
happened before...

(Magic triggers her affliction, huh... Can't help but
wonder if it has something to do with possession...)

You've had that cough for a while, right?
Does anywhere else hurt?

Now that you mention it, I feel nauseous and kind
of tired... But it's not something you need to worry
about.

But I am worried. If your mind deteriorates while
your body is weakened, I get the feeling it will
be too late...
Don't patronize me!
Oh...

My unfailingly overbearing sister suddenly drops
like a rock.

(She's probably exhausted from all that training.
I'd best play the worried younger brother here.)
C-Claire, are you okay?!
Aahh...

Y-You must've strained yourself...
What am I gonna do...

I put on a show of concern as I check the flow of
magic within her.

(These are symptoms of possession... I can feel the
raging magic pulsing from her.)

(If I don't do something, she'll turn into a mound of
flesh like Alpha.)

(It sounds kinda messed up, but maybe I can use her
as a test subject while I heal her.)

(This is a rare opportunity to tackle the early
stages of possession.)
I-I'll get you to my room! Hang in there, Claire!
Sorry you had to carry me... Was I heavy?

My reply is purposefully vague. I can't afford to let
my guard down around her, even at a time like this.

If I say she was easy to carry, she'll get mad at me
for implying that she has no muscle. If I say she was
heavy, she'll say I have no delicacy. This is a lose-
lose situation.

It's fine, you can take the rest of the day off, Cid.
Tomorrow's practice will make you regret the day
you were born.
But I'm worried about you...

(That ain't gonna happen. I can't let this chance
slip through my fingers.)

Right, but before that... Do you think we can do some
cooldown stretches?
Cooldown...stretches...?

If she's repeating me, she's probably never heard
those words before. I don't plan on explaining.

You don't know? I read in a book that it's good to
stretch after excersize.

By rubbing the places that ache, you can prevent
injuries and it keeps you from feeling tired.
Fine, if you insist...

I search for the source of her possession under
the cover of doing the stretches.

She must've finally relaxed, because before I know it
she is asleep. That lets me check more thoroughly.
...Hmm.

(Interesting, this is fairly simple when they aren't
a blob. Shouldn't take much time at all to fix.)

(...Okay, I've done all I can, so I'll make myself
scarce and skip the fallout when she wakes up.)

And so, without anyone knowing, I eventually healed
my sister's possession.
